names.english: regulate qi and clear stagnation decoction
names.commonEnglish: Regulate Qi and Clear Stagnation Decoction

actions: Promotes the movement of Qi, dissipates clumps and stops pain.
Spreads Liver Qi and relieves Stagnation.
With Bai Shao, for vertigo, dizziness and thoracic and costal pain due to Liver Qi Stagnation.
With Zhi Ke, for a stifling sensation in the chest, abdominal pain, poor appetite and irregular bowel movements.
Promotes the movement of Qi and reduces distention and pressure.
Nourishes the Blood, astringes Yin, adjusts the Ying and Wei, softens the Liver and relieves pain.
With Chai Hu, for flank pain due to Liver Qi Stagnation.
Relaxes the sinews, invigorates the collaterals and invigorates the Blood
Warms and tonifies the Kidneys and strengthens Yang.
Supplements the Liver, warms the Kidneys, fortifies Yang and astringes Jing.
Unblocks Yang Qi, alleviates pain, descends Qi and reduces Stagnation.
Promotes the movement of Blood and invigorates the channels.

symptoms: Inability to get or sustain an erection
Distention and pain in the sides or flanks
